entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonSerializer.Serialize does not serialize properties as interface data type #75402
  • Add analyzer for DateTimeOffset implicit operator with DateTime. #75400
  • WebSockets downgrade to 1.1 on network failure during TLS handshake #75399
  • [wasm] perf pipeline: All wasm jobs broken with `RuntimeError: Unable to determine the .NET SDK used for net7.0` #75398
  • Try improved method for generating bounded random integers #75395
  • [WASM] Anonymous pipes issue #75394
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Debugger test `ExceptionTestUncaughtWithReload` failing #75392
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Multiple `JIT.*` runtime test failures on rolling builds #75391
    7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] The System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.Tests TransformManyBlockTests.TestProducerConsumerAsyncEnumerable fails on Browser when multi-threading is enabled #75389
    8.0.0
  • [P/Invoke] Tuples should be marked with LayoutKind.Sequential instead of LayoutKind.Auto #75388
  • Dotnet self-contained apps fail to start when run in a directory containing a backslash #75387
  • [API Proposal]: Interlocked.CompareExchange and Interlocked.Exchange Generic Overload with Unmanaged Type Constraint #75385

Closed

  • System.Net.* and System.Security.* crash on NativeAOT arm64 #74710
    7.0.0
  • DateTime.UtcNow Analyzer #59012
    Future
  • [wasm] All wasm jobs failing on perf pipeline with `.withExitOnUnhandledError is not a function` #75268
  • JIT: Bad codegen on win-x86 #75249
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `Wasm.Build.Tests` are broken on `main` #75223
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Make forward sub a little bit more precise in GLOB_REF tagging #75404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Flush instruction cache after thunk pool allocation #75403
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace marshalled delegate in X509Certificate verification #75401
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Bump the NoTargets version #75397
  • Add RID for alpine-3.17 + alpine-{armv6,x86,s390x,ppc64le} #75396
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Update System.Formats.Tar docs #75386
    documentation, area-System.IO
  • Fix running WebAssembly Browser App from VS #75384
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Implement List<T>.Slice #75383
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Flush instruction cache after thunk pool allocation #75393
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [workloads] Add new workloads for net8.0 #75200
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: block copy/zero assertion gen for structs with exposed promoted … #75375
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid date string allocation in OpenSslX509CertificateReader.ExtractValidityDateTime #75138
    area-System.Security
  • Use LastIndexOf{Any} in Path.GetFileName #75318
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [Release/7.0] Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #74822
    area-Meta
  • Disable MonitoringIsEnabled with issue 75302 #75306
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Missed full type initialization #75340
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Initial osx-arm64 bring up #75264
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Pad the perm table to avoid array out of bound #75364
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fixing PhysicalFilesWatcher path maintenance (Issue #71386) #72041
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • JIT: run local struct to field update in morph both pre and post order for returns #75304
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Quiet NaNs on x86 hosts #75338
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete a few dead NetworkInformation helpers #74976
    area-System.Net
  • Add EqualityComparer<T>.Create #75212
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix prefix writing on TarHeaderWrite #75373
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm-mt] Disable and fix remaining failing tests on Browser with multi-threading and perf tracing enabled #75286
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Delete `(unsigned)CHECK_SPILL_ALL|NONE` casts #72889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Optimize the performance of InternalConfigurationRootExtensions.GetChildrenImplementation #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • update helix queues to pick up MsQuic 2.1.1 #75380
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Fix IPv6 detection in QUIC tests #75382
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Do not emit mangled names in mstat files #75328
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify windows version detection in vm #75254
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Some feedback for 8.0 after doing PR on #75366 for 7.0-rc2. #75379
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Adjust the lpParent of "adopted" child loops #75218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make RegisterChangeCallback consistent with CancellationChangeToken #75158
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Manually backporting #74599 to 7.0 for RC2. #75366
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • Supply official build id to inner-source build command #75293
  • Add RIDs for macOS 13 #75371
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
